A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Long and unnecessary. So many weird side missions that came to nothing but a sore bum. In an attempt to make the dialogue urgent insteqadq it was sappy and purposeless. So many things I should have cared about but after more than 2 and a half hours I barely flinched. Visually beautiful as always\, but the Disney crutch of popping a joke in to move the scene along was overwrought and ham fisted.\nI'll still see it again though.
